com.g3d.system
Interface G3DContext

All Known Implementing Classes:
LwjglContext, LwjglDisplay
public interface G3DContext

Represents a rendering context within the engine.

Nested Class Summary
static class G3DContext.Type
          The type of context.
 
Method Summary
 void create()
          Creates the context and makes it active.
 void destroy()
          Destroys the context completely, making it inactive.
 Renderer getRenderer()
           
 Timer getTimer()
           
 G3DContext.Type getType()
           
 boolean isActive()
           
 boolean isCloseRequested()
           
 void restart()
          Destroys and then re-creates the context.
 void setDisplaySettings(DisplaySettings settings)
           
 void update()
          Update the context.
 

Method Detail

getType

G3DContext.Type getType()
Returns:
The type of the context.

isCloseRequested

boolean isCloseRequested()
Returns:
True if the user requested to close the context.

setDisplaySettings

void setDisplaySettings(DisplaySettings settings)
Parameters:
settings - the display settings to use for the created context. If the context has already been created, then restart() must be called for the changes to be applied.

getRenderer

Renderer getRenderer()
Returns:
The renderer for this context, or null if not created yet.

getTimer

Timer getTimer()
Returns:
The timer for this context, or null if not created yet.

isActive

boolean isActive()
Returns:
True if the context is currently active (meaning, it has been created but not yet destroyed).

create

void create()
Creates the context and makes it active.

restart

void restart()
Destroys and then re-creates the context. This should be called after the display settings have been changed.

destroy

void destroy()
Destroys the context completely, making it inactive.

update

void update()
Update the context. Should be called every frame.
